entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 after midnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 7 April 2023
